content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #116

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Improve the sentence "The subscring app may query a session's current context" to provide a better understanding from the reader

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Overview
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Improve the sentence "The subscring app may query a session's current context" to provide a better understanding from the reader

Comment: The sentence "The subscring app may query a session's current context" is not easy to understand.

Adding an example may help.

Existing wording: The subscring app may query a session's current context and initiate context changes by accessing APIs exposed by the Hub

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #116

Proposed resolution: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed resolution: Will update sentence by removing it per #143

isaacvetter commented on Issue #116:

## :telephone_receiver: II Working Group Vote (5-30-2019)

Meeting notes: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IMIN/Teleconferences

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by @gkustas

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:Will update sentence by removing it per #143

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
